text: Daniel "Dani" Gómez Alcón (born 30 July 1998) is a Spanish professional footballer who plays for Levante UD as a forward. ==Club career== Born in Alcorcón, Community of Madrid, Gómez joined Real Madrid's youth setup in 2011, from AD Alcorcón. Promoted to the reserves for the 2017–18 season, he made his senior debut on 19 August 2017, starting and scoring his team's only in a 1–2 Segunda División B home loss against CF Rayo Majadahonda. On 26 July 2018, Gómez renewed his contract with Los Blancos. On 15 July of the following year, he agreed to a one-year loan deal with Segunda División side CD Tenerife. Gómez made his professional debut on 17 August 2019, coming on as a second- half substitute for José Naranjo in a 0–2 away loss against Real Zaragoza. He scored his first goal in the second division on 15 September, netting the fourth in a 4–0 away routing of Albacete Balompié. On 31 July 2020, after scoring 11 goals overall in the previous campaign, Gómez signed a five-year deal with La Liga side Levante UD. ==References== ==External links== *Real Madrid profile * * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:People from Alcorcón Category:Spanish footballers Category:Madrilenian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Segunda División players Category:Segunda División B players Category:Real Madrid Castilla footballers Category:CD Tenerife players Category:Levante UD footballers Category:Spain youth international footballers Category:Spain under-21 international footballers
title: Daniel Gómez Alcón
